price: Abo ni bo bihutira gukora ibyiza, kandi ni na bo baza imbere muri byo.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَهُمۡ لَهَا سَٰبِقُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ulāika yusāriʿūna fī al-khayrāti wahum lahā sābiqūna
